info.name: Dive Flag
info.description: A happy accident. Bob Ross would be proud. Quick Rough Version. Will expand on later.

renderpass.code:
float plot(vec2 st){                                //returns stripe
    return smoothstep(.40,.39, abs(-st.y - st.x));} //overengineered
                                                    //TOO BAD!!!

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = (fragCoord -.5 * iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y;//moves uv to center
    float t = iTime;//will use later to add wave effects etc.
    vec3 col = vec3(1., 0., 0.); //red surface to start
    uv.y = 1. * uv.x + 3.8 * uv.y; //adjust uv shape/size etc so stripe will position correctly
    float pct = plot(uv);//creates white stripe, really want a red stripe, hooray beer!
    col += pct;//adds stripe!
    
    fragColor = vec4(col,1.0);
}
renderpass.name: Image
